column4: Hi, I'm having a problem installing nvidia-96... it seems that its dependancies are a little broken... since it requires  nvidia-96 : Depends: xorg-video-abi-8.0 but it is not installable              Depends: xserver-xorg-core (>= 2:1.8.99.905-1ubuntu3) but it is not going to be installed (1st one can't be installed because of hte second or something like that... how do I get this driver?
have a look. It may be a known issue
you may find xorg edgers ppa gives the version but its very experimental. It may just work though
